name: Kara
appearance: Roped forearms and old rope-burns, shark-tooth charm on a leather thong, salt-silvered hair.
character: Blunt and protective; speaks for those who work the gates and the night.
talents: smells current shifts a bell ahead
rallies crews in rain and fog
dreams: Compact control of all night docks
safety stewards in every Engine shift-room
a quiet quayhouse for retired pilots
secrets: hid illegal lock-keys beneath the memorial rope
took a Veil escort during a famine run without declaring it
faked a cargo tally to slip extra grain to Molden Quays
